long_desc.thetext:
FEDORA-2024-c3d18db936 (microcode_ctl-2.1-66.fc42) has been submitted as an update to Fedora 42.
https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2024-c3d18db936

FEDORA-2024-c3d18db936 (microcode_ctl-2.1-66.fc42) has been pushed to the Fedora 42 stable repository.
If problem still persists, please make note of it in this bug report.

FEDORA-2024-8b65ec8c46 (microcode_ctl-2.1-66.fc41) has been submitted as an update to Fedora 41.
https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2024-8b65ec8c46

FEDORA-2024-5253005b93 has been pushed to the Fedora 39 testing repository.
Soon you'll be able to install the update with the following command:
`sudo dnf upgrade --enablerepo=updates-testing --refresh --advisory=FEDORA-2024-5253005b93`
You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2024-5253005b93

See also https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for more information on how to test updates.

comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by esyr.
This update's test gating status has been changed to 'ignored'.
This update has obsoleted [microcode_ctl-2.1-61.4.fc40](https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2024-ea06c189fe), and has inherited its bugs and notes.
This update has been pushed to testing.
